ViewAttribute.Name: AccTypeValueDisplay
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: AccAccessoryType

ViewAttribute.Name: BagDimensionsTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((AccWidth != null ? "W" : "") + (AccHeight != null ? "H" : "") + (BgGusset != null ? "G" : "") + (BgFlap != null ? "F" : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: BagResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (BgZipColor != null ? BgZipColor : "") + " " + (BgBagType != null ? BgBagType : "") + " " + (BagSizeTrans != null ? BagSizeTrans : "") + " " + (AccWidthUom != null ? AccWidthUom : "") + " " + (BgBagPocket != null ? BgBagPocket : "") + " " + (BagPocketTrans != null ? BagPocketTrans : "") + " " + (BgMaterialGuage != null ? BgMaterialGuage : "") + " " + (BgMaterialSpecs != null ? BgMaterialSpecs : "") + " " + (BgBagMaterial != null ? BgBagMaterial : "") + " " + (BgZipSize != null ? "Zipper #" + BgZipSize : "") + " " + (BgZipMaterial != null ? BgZipMaterial : "") + " " + (BgPrintType != null ? BgPrintType : "") + " " + (BgBtnMaterial != null ? BgBtnMaterial : "") + " " + (BgBtnColor != null ? BgBtnColor : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: ProgramNameDesc
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT P.PROG_NAME FROM XXPM_MADEUP_PROGRAMS P WHERE P.PROG_CODE = XxpmItemMaster.SEGMENT7)

ViewAttribute.Name: InsDimensionsTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((AccWidth1 != null ? "W" : "") + (AccLength1 != null ? "L" : "") + (InsGusset != null ? "G" : "") + (AccLength2 != null ? "L" : "") + (AccWidth2 != null ? "W" : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: InsResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (InsInsertType != null ? InsInsertType : "") + " " + (InsText != null ? InsText : "") + " " + (InsSizeTrans != null ? "(" + InsSizeTrans + " " + (AccLengthUom != null && InsSizeTrans != null ? AccLengthUom : "") + ")" : "") + " " + (InsVarnish != null ? InsVarnish : "") + " " + (InsMaterialGsm != null ? InsMaterialGsm : "") + " " + (InsPaperType != null ? InsPaperType : "") + " " + (InsLamination != null ? InsLamination : "") + " " + (InsFixType != null ? InsFixType : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: StfSizeTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((AccLength1 != null ? AccLength1.toString() : "") + (AccLength1 != null && StfGusset1 != null ? "x" : "") + (StfGusset1 != null ? StfGusset1.toString() : "") + (StfGusset1 != null && AccLength2 != null ? "x" : "") + (AccLength2 != null ? AccLength2.toString() : "") + (AccLength2 != null && StfGusset2 != null ? "x" : "") + (StfGusset2 != null ? StfGusset2.toString() : "") + (StfGusset2 != null && AccWidth ? "x" : "") + (AccWidth != null ? AccWidth.toString() : "") ).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: StfResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (StfStifnerType != null ? StfStifnerType : "") + " " + (StfSizeTrans != null ? "(" + StfSizeTrans + " " + (AccLengthUom != null && StfSizeTrans != null ? AccLengthUom : "")+ ")" : "") + " " + (StfPly != null ? StfPly : "") + " " + (StfMaterial != null ? StfMaterial : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: CrtOutDimensionTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((CrtOutWidth != null || CrtOutLength != null || CrtOutHeight != null ? "Outer " : "") + " " + (CrtOutWidth != null ? "W" : "") + (CrtOutLength != null ? "L" : "") + (CrtOutHeight != null ? "H" : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: CrtInDimensionTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((CrtInnWidth != null || CrtInnLength != null || CrtInnHeight != null ? "Inner " : "") + " " + (CrtInnWidth != null ? "W" : "") + (CrtInnLength != null ? "L" : "") + (CrtInnHeight != null ? "H" : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: CrtSizeTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((CrtOutWidth != null ? CrtOutWidth.toString() : "") + (CrtOutWidth != null && CrtOutLength != null ? "x" : "") + (CrtOutLength != null ? CrtOutLength.toString() : "") + ((CrtOutWidth != null || CrtOutLength != null) && CrtOutHeight != null ? "x" : "") + (CrtOutHeight != null ? CrtOutHeight.toString() : "") + " " + (CrtOutUom != null ? CrtOutUom.toString() : "") + " " + (CrtOutDimensionTrans != null ? CrtOutDimensionTrans.toString() : "") + " " + (CrtInnWidth != null ? CrtInnWidth.toString() : "") + (CrtInnWidth != null && CrtInnLength != null ? "x" : "") + (CrtInnLength != null ? CrtInnLength.toString() : "") + ((CrtInnWidth != null || CrtInnLength != null) && CrtInnHeight != null ? "x" : "") + (CrtInnHeight != null ? CrtInnHeight.toString() : "") + " " + (CrtInnUom != null ? CrtInnUom.toString() : "") + " " + (CrtInDimensionTrans != null ? CrtInDimensionTrans.toString() : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: CrtResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (CrtPrintType != null ? CrtPrintType : "") + " " + (CrtPrintedType != null ? CrtPrintedType : "") + " " + (CrtCartonType != null ? CrtCartonType : "") + " " + (CrtSizeTrans != null ? "(" + CrtSizeTrans + ")" : "") + " " + (CrtPly != null ? CrtPly : "") + " " + (CrtMaterial != null ? CrtMaterial : "") + " " + (CrtEct != null ? CrtEct : "") + " " + (CrtBusting != null ? CrtBusting : "") + " " + (CrtText != null ? CrtText : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: LblResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (LblMaterial != null && LblMaterial.length() > 0 ? LblMaterial : "") + " " + (LblLableType != null && LblLableType.length() > 0 ? LblLableType : "") + " " + (LblPlainSizeTrans != null && LblPlainSizeTrans.length() > 0 ? "(" + LblPlainSizeTrans + ")" : "") + (LblPlainSizeTrans != null && LblPlainSizeTrans.length() > 0 && LblFoldSizeTrans.length() > 0 ? "x" : "") + (LblFoldSizeTrans != null && LblFoldSizeTrans.length() > 0 ? "(" + LblFoldSizeTrans + ")" : "") + " " + (accWidthUom != null ? accWidthUom : "") + " " + (LblPlainSwingMargin == LblFoldSwingMargin ? LblPlainSwingMargin + " Sewing Margin on both sides" : (LblPlainSwingMargin != null && LblFoldSwingMargin != null ? LblPlainSwingMargin + " + " + LblFoldSwingMargin + " Sewing Margin" : (LblPlainSwingMargin != null ? LblPlainSwingMargin + " Sewing Margin" : "") + (LblFoldSwingMargin != null ? LblFoldSwingMargin + " Sewing Margin" : ""))) + " " + (AccSize != null && AccSize.length() > 0 ? "(" + AccSize + ")" : "") + " " + (LblFoldingType != null && LblFoldingType.length() > 0 ? LblFoldingType : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: ZipResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (ZipMaterialType != null ? ZipMaterialType : "") + " " + (AccLength != null ? AccLength.toString() : "") + (ZipUom != null && AccLength != null ? ZipUom + " L2L" : "") + " " + (ZipTeethType != null ? ZipTeethType : "") + " " + (AccSize != null ? AccSize : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: ThrResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (ThrThreadType != null ? ThrThreadType : "") + " " + (ThrThreadUsage != null ? ThrThreadUsage : "") + " " + (ThrMaterial != null ? ThrMaterial : "") + " " + (ThrTexSizePly != null ? ThrTexSizePly + "," : "") + " " + (AccLength != null ? AccLength : "") + " " + (AccLengthUom != null ? AccLengthUom : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: ElsResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (ElsElasticType != null ? ElsElasticType : "") + " " + (AccWidth != null ? AccWidth : "") + " " + (AccWidthUom != null ? AccWidthUom : "") + " " + (ElsCordType != null ? ElsCordType : "") + " " + (ElsRatio != null ? ElsRatio : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: CtcResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (CtcMaterial != null ? CtcMaterial : "") + " " + (CtcDiaThickness != null ? CtcDiaThickness : "") + " " + (CtcItemType != null ? CtcItemType : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: FusResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (FusMaterial != null ? FusMaterial : "") + " " + (FusGsm != null ? FusGsm + " GSM " : "") + " " + (AccWidth != null ? AccWidth : "") + (AccWidth != null ? "'' Wide" : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: NwvResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (NwvMaterial != null ? NwvMaterial : "") + " " + (NwvGsm != null ? NwvGsm + " GSM " : "") + " " + (AccWidth != null ? AccWidth : "") + (AccWidth != null ? "'' Width" : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: WdResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (WdRatio != null ? WdRatio + "%" : "") + " " + (WdMaterial != null ? WdMaterial : "") + " " + (WdGsm != null ? WdGsm + " GSM " : "") + " " + (AccWidth != null ? AccWidth + "'' Wide" : "") + " " + (WdLoaft != null ? WdLoaft + " Loaft" : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: BfResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (BfMaterialType != null ? BfMaterialType : "") + " " + (BfMaterial != null ? BfMaterial : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: BtnResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (BtnButtonMaterial != null ? BtnButtonMaterial : "") + " " + (BtnButtonType != null ? BtnButtonType : "") + " " + (BtnButtonSize != null ? BtnButtonSize : "") + " " + (BtnHolesNum != null ? BtnHolesNum + " Holes " : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: PprResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (PprPaperColor != null ? PprPaperColor : "") + " " + (PprPaperMaterial != null ? PprPaperMaterial : "") + " " + (AccLength != null ? AccLength + "L" : "") + (AccLength != null && AccWidth != null ? "x" : "") + (AccWidth != null ? AccWidth + "W" : "") + " " + (AccWidthUom != null ? AccWidthUom : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: StkResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (StkPeelableType != null ? StkPeelableType : "") + " " + (StkMaterial != null ? StkMaterial : "") + " " + (StkStickerType != null ? StkStickerType : "") + " " + (AccLength != null ? AccLength + "L" : "") + (AccLength != null && AccWidth != null ? "x" : "") + (AccWidth != null ? AccWidth + "W" : "") + ((AccLength != null || AccWidth != null) && AccDiameter != null ? "x" : "") + (AccDiameter != null ? AccDiameter + "D" : "") + " " + (AccDiameterUom != null ? AccDiameterUom : "") + " " + (StkPerforatedType != null ? StkPerforatedType : "") + " " + (StkColor != null ? StkColor : "") + " " + (StkText != null ? StkText : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: SgResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (SgItem != null ? SgItem : "") + " " + (SgWeight != null ? SgWeight : "") + " " + (AccLengthUom != null && SgWeight != null ? AccLengthUom : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: TpResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (TpColor != null ? TpColor : "") + " " + (AccSize != null ? AccSize : "") + " " + (TpMaterialType != null ? TpMaterialType : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: TgResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (AccSize != null ? AccSize : "") + " " + (AccCustVal != null ? AccCustVal : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: LacResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (LacColor != null ? LacColor : "") + " " + (AccSize != null ? AccSize : "") + " " + (LacUom != null ? LacUom : "") + " " + (LacType != null ? LacType : "") + " " + (LacMaterial != null ? LacMaterial : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: EyResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (EyColor != null ? EyColor : "") + " " + (EyFinish != null ? EyFinish : "") + " " + (EyMaterial != null ? EyMaterial : "") + " " + (AccDiameter != null ? AccDiameter + " Inch Dia" : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: HngResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (HngMaterialCombination != null ? HngMaterialCombination : "") + " " + (HngHookType != null ? HngHookType : "") + " (" + (AccHeight != null ? AccHeight + "H" : "") + " " + (AccHeightUom != null ? AccHeightUom : "") + "x" + (AccLength != null ? AccLength + "L" : "") + " " + (AccLengthUom != null ? AccLengthUom : "") + "x" + (HngThickness != null ? HngThickness + "T" : "") + " " + (HngThicknessUom != null ? HngThicknessUom : "") + ")" + " & Hook Dia " + (AccDiameter != null ? AccDiameter : "") + " " + (AccDiameterUom != null ? AccDiameterUom : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: PmResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (AccCustVal != null ? AccCustVal : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: StrResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (StrDescription != null ? StrDescription : "") ).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: TapResultantTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ((ProgramNameDesc != null ? ProgramNameDesc : "") + " " + (TapPrintText != null ? TapPrintText : "") + " " + (TapMaterial != null ? TapMaterial : "") + " " + (AccWidth != null ? AccWidth : "") + " " + (AccWidthUom != null ? AccWidthUom : "")).replaceAll("\\s+", " ").trim()

ViewAttribute.Name: ItemStatusFlagTrans
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: ItemStatusFlag == 1 ? 'Active' : 'Inactive'
